entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 7.7°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: SSE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3
